name: Farmer Fields
description:
\\\\ DESCRIPTION \\\\

You are a farmer trying to make money in order to surprise your family with a new house.

Plant seeds, grow plants, harvest them, sell them, and buy more seeds until you have enough money.

This game was made for My First Game Jam: Winter 2023

\\\\ HOW TO PLAY \\\\

READ THE GUIDE IN THE GAME FILES
